授業方法: Classes will be conducted through lectures in English, supplemented by a rich array of multimedia resources. Students will engage with documentaries, movies, music, and news articles to gain a comprehensive understanding of Australian culture. These materials are selected to enhance learning and provide varied perspectives on the topics discussed.
